activations module¶

class activations.LeakyReLU(alpha)¶

Bases: function.Function

backward(dY)¶

Backward pass. Computes the local gradient at the input value after forward pass.

forward(X)¶

Forward pass of the function. Calculates the output value (label) and the gradient at the input as well.

local_grad(X)¶

Calculates the local gradients of the function at the given input.

Returns:

grad: dictionary of local gradients.
